Demo

This demo was built using machado

machado is a Django application that contains tools to interact with a Chado database. It provides users with a framework to store, search and visualize biological data.

Features

  • There are data loaders for the major bioinformatics formats: fasta, gff, obo, bibtex, blast, interproscan, orthomcl
  • The machado API delivers data directly to the JBrowse genome browser
  • The Haystack framework provides a very fast search interface using the Elasticsearch engine

Installation

Please refer to the complete documentation at Read the docs.
